thread.title: Patricia
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text: Beautiful choice in furniture !! They stand by their furniture and make any problems correct in a timely fashion. Only complaint is when some service men deliver, do not properly tighten screws, etc.. Quick in and out. Always make sure furniture is secure before they leave !!
